casebody.data:
No. 10-7879. Robert Beale, John Howard Pelton, and Frederick Ogan Bond, Petitioners v. United States. 562 U.S. 1190, 131 S. Ct. 1023,

178 L. Ed. 2d 847,

2011 U.S. LEXIS 896. January 18, 2011.

Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Eighth Circuit denied.

Same case below, 620 F.3d 856.
